title: [gameplay] kindred visual bug with joke animation
body: Kindred's joke animation gets wonky once lamb pulls the bowstring with her foot. Instead of stretching the bowstring, both ends of the bow stretch into her foot. I repeated the animation just to make sure it wasn't a one time fluke, and it occurs every time I use joke. This was done in 1 person, no AI, custom game, regular non-PBE client.

replies.body:
Hey Sapphiel,

I poked champion about this one and it's actually working as intended.
